verse.roman:
kṛtirātas tatas tasmān
mahāromā ca tat-sutaḥ
svarṇaromā sutas tasya
hrasvaromā vyajāyata

synonyms: kṛtirātaḥ—Kṛtirāta; tataḥ—from Mahādhṛti; tasmāt—from Kṛtirāta; mahāromā—a son named Mahāromā; ca—also; tat-sutaḥ—his son; svarṇaromā—Svarṇaromā; sutaḥ tasya—his son; hrasvaromā—Hrasvaromā; vyajāyata—were all born.
translation: From Mahādhṛti was born a son named Kṛtirāta, from Kṛtirāta was born Mahāromā, from Mahāromā came a son named Svarṇaromā, and from Svarṇaromā came Hrasvaromā.
